page.title: 07COLLEGE OF ART - HEREFORD
page.content: The Art College is the third of the Colleges to be situated on the Aylestone Campus just off Foley Lane. This College offers a wide variety of courses. Diploma Courses in Art and Design give students a good general grounding before going on to higher education. The Certificate Courses are mainly concerned with providing students with training in a single specialist area prior to employment, such as clothing manufacture, photography, hair dressing and retail display. Combined courses are structured to combine art studies with general education. Some GCE subjects offered are not available elsewhere in the County. eg Theatre Studies. Jewellry, Ironwork, Ceramics and Graphics are all popular options for students and displays of students' work is a feature of this college.
